# setConfiguration(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the configuration of this interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
func setConfiguration(_ configuration: TabletopInteraction.Configuration)
```

## Managing the interaction destination

- **TabletopInteraction.Configuration**
- **TabletopInteraction.AllowedDestinations**: The possible destinations of equipment in an interaction.
- **TabletopInteraction.Destination**: An object that represents the destination position and orientation of equipment in an interaction.
- **setAllowedDestinations(_:)**: Sets which equipment the interaction can target.
